thread.title: Aston Martin Lagonda with Tomek Olszowski
thread.title_full: Aston Martin Lagonda with Tomek Olszowski

title: Aston Martin Lagonda with Tomek Olszowski
text: Cult cars don't come much less conventional any than the Aston Martin Lagonda. Only 645 were ever made, and they're like no other car before or since. The wedge-shaped body is the height of a Porsche 911 but over five metres long, with a outrageously space-age dashboard. In this shoot, a touch of seventies noir accents the car's angular forms, and we introduced it to the driver that its retro-futuristic style deserves.
